mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CATCARELOG (CATCARELOG_NO, CATCARELOG_USERNUM, CATCARELOG_SERVICENUM, CATCARELOG_WRITER, CATCARELOG_TITLE, CATCARELOG_CONTNET, CATCARELOG_FILES, CATCARELOG_CARESTART, CATCARELOG_CAREEND) VALUES((select nvl(max(CATCARELOG_NO), 0)+1 from CATCARELOG),#{CATCARELOG_USERNUM}, #{CATCARELOG_SERVICENUM}, #{CATCARELOG_WRITER}, #{CATCARELOG_TITLE}, #{CATCARELOG_CONTNET}, #{CATCARELOG_FILES, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CATCARELOG_CARESTART}, #{CATCARELOG_CAREEND} )
